Description: As a user I want to be able to register so that my suggestions and votes can be attributed.

Summary: Allow user to login using Google credentials
Description: As a user I want to be able to identify myself using alternative credentials so that I do not have to remember site specific login details.

Summary: Allow user to login using Twitter credentials
Description: As a user I want to be able to identify myself using alternative credentials so that I do not have to remember site specific login details.

Summary: Allow user to login using Microsoft credentials
Description: As a user I want to be able to identify myself using alternative credentials so that I do not have to remember site specific login details.
As an authenticated user I want to create a new suggestion record so this can be shared with others
As an authenticated user I want to update a suggestion record that I created so that I can correct mistakes and add additional information

Summary: Add tags to a suggestion record
Description: As an authenticated user I want to append one or more 'tags' to a suggestion record so that the record can be categorised.
As a visitor to the site I want to see a list of existing suggestions.

Summary: Add a comment to a suggestion record
Description: As an authenticated user I want to append one or more comments to a suggestion record so that I can ask/answer questions about it.
